content: Why isn’t the MVP a Warrior? Twelve teams have won 67 games in NBA history. Nine had the MVP and three had the runner-up. Who cares about 55 wins for the Rox or 51 for the Cavs? Those are middling playoff records just as much as OKC. If wins are your big criteria, Harden and LeBron are out along with Russ and a Warrior should win.
